pic1_alt: Horizontal bar chart of top 25 R-Ladies Chapters by average number of events per year. The highest is rladies-dc with 20 events. rladies-guayaquil, rladies-tunis and rladies-freiburg also have more than 15. montreal, ames, philly, conception tbilisi, tampa, melbourne, austin, new-york, galapagos islands and syndney have between 11 and 14. london, scl, bariloche, dallas, rtp, valparaiso, barranquilla, seattle, columbus and la paz have between 8 and 10 average events per year.
pic2_alt: Vertical rainbow colored bar chart of R-Ladies Chapters event distributions. In 2013-2015 there were about 40 events per year. In 2016 that went up to almost 100. In 2017 that went to 350. In 2018 there were more than 600. In 2019 and 2020 there were about 900. There's a decline in 2021 to about 750, then 400 in 2022. In 2023 of events counted so far there were 150.
